text: was a Japanese amateur and professional wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman light heavyweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. After his competitve career, he worked in International Wrestling Enterprise, All Japan Pro Wrestling and New Japan Pro Wrestling under the ring name of Thunder Sugiyama, later becoming an actor and tarento.Forgotten International Wrestling, 2014, Baseball Magazine. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- !
